EmailTemplate.name: 07-13-22 DBNK Kasisto Webinar Email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE - [Webinar] With Digital Assistants… Personality Matters
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Did you know an intelligent digital assistant can become your institution’s best brand ambassador? Join Kasisto, NCR and BankSouth on Thursday, July 14, for an interactive webinar demonstrating how an intelligent digital assistant can become your institution’s best digital employee. Hear about BankSouth’s journey with Rita, an AI-powered digital assistant, and how she’s helped the bank reshape customer experiences across digital and physical channels, manage call center volume and grow its business. Key topics of this one-hour webinar include: - What technology is involved in creating an effective digital assistant - The differences between a chatbot and a digital assistant—and why it matters - The immediate impacts employees and end users can expect - Getting employees to become raving fans With Digital Assistants … Personality Matters Thursday, July 14 at 2 p.m. EDT / 11 a.m. PDT We hope you’ll join us! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
